alert.note: Alert for Erath; Somervell (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 14 at 3:30PM CDT until September 14 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Small stream and minor flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Portions of Bosque, Erath, and Somervell Counties. * WHEN...Until 430 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water flows over low-water crossings and other poor-drainage areas. River and stream flows are elevated. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Glen Rose, Iredell, Dinosaur Valley State Park, Lake Whitney, Walnut Springs, Morgan, Purves, Eulogy, Chalk Mountain, Duffau, Johnsville, Brazos Point, Selden, Clairette, Kopperl, Lakeside Village and Alexander. - The heavy rain has ended, however it will take some time for water to recede and stream flows to lessen.
info.instruction: Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
